h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: You can find some Fragrant Jade Flower to harvest in the corner of the arena, as well as another large area to the right with two **Treasure Chests** stashed away in opposite corners, and then follow your ally into the next area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
You can find some Fragrant Jade Flower to harvest in the corner of the arena, as well as another large area to the right with two **Treasure Chests** stashed away in opposite corners, and then follow your ally into the next area.
